description.value: An extension to mark a `CareTeam.contributor` in profile <http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-NursingIntervention> as the Requester of Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) NursingIntervention-v3.2(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/NursingIntervention-v3.2(2020EN)).
